description:
A new sword, Juzumaru Tsunetsugu, appears, and Kashuu is made to go along with his training in the mountains. Meanwhile, Honebami Toushirou gets left behind when he is dispatched and ends up in the wrong time period...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: February: I Wish Tomorrow Will Be a Good Day, Too
Kisaragi: Ashita mo Ii Hi ni Narimasu You ni
如月 明日もいい日になりますように
